subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Point guard Kyle Anderson, with his unusual skills and leisurely pace, finished with 15 points, 8 rebounds and 5 assists as the No. 4 Bruins dispatched the 13th-seeded Lumberjacks.
snippet: Point guard Kyle Anderson, with his unusual skills and leisurely pace, finished with 15 points, 8 rebounds and 5 assists as the No. 4 Bruins dispatched the 13th-seeded Lumberjacks.
